LanguageData.FT_FrailBack.degreeDatas.0.label: frail back
LanguageData.FT_FrailBack.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a frail back so HE can't carry as much as the average person.
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.0.label: strong back
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a strong back which allows HIM to carry more than most people.
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.1.label: very strong back
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has a very strong back or is part mule or something. HECAP can carry twice as much as a normal person.
LanguageData.FT_AnimalFriend.degreeDatas.0.label: animal friend
LanguageData.FT_AnimalFriend.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: NAME has a passion for animals. HECAP gets bonuses to all animal interactions.
LanguageData.FT_Ghoulish.degreeDatas.0.label: ghoulish
LanguageData.FT_Ghoulish.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is still human, mostly. HECAP is immune to the effects of toxic fallout but their ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
LanguageData.FT_RadResistant.degreeDatas.0.label: rad resistant
LanguageData.FT_RadResistant.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: NAME's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
LanguageData.FT_ActionBoy.degreeDatas.0.label: action boy
LanguageData.FT_ActionBoy.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME There's no time to waste! HECAP has increased movement and workspeed.
LanguageData.FT_ActionGirl.degreeDatas.0.label: action girl
LanguageData.FT_ActionGirl.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME There's no time to waste! HECAP has increased movement and workspeed.
LanguageData.FT_QuickHands.degreeDatas.0.label: quick hands
LanguageData.FT_QuickHands.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has quick hands. When it comes to HIS hands, NAME never hesitates.
LanguageData.FT_IdiotSavant.degreeDatas.0.label: idiot savant
LanguageData.FT_IdiotSavant.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME isn't stupid! HE is just... different. HECAP learns twice as fast but works slower than normal, HE is also incapable handling some tasks.
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.0.label: charismatic
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a charismatic personality. HECAP gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.1.label: very charismatic
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has a very charismatic personality. HECAP gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
LanguageData.FT_GunNut.degreeDatas.0.label: gun nut
LanguageData.FT_GunNut.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is a gun nut, HE loves guns. HECAP gets a mood bonus while holding a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.FT_Rooted.degreeDatas.0.label: rooted
LanguageData.FT_Rooted.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is part tree! HECAP can really take a beating!
LanguageData.FT_Toughness.degreeDatas.0.label: tough
LanguageData.FT_Toughness.degreeDatas.0.description: If nothing else, NAME can really take a beating!
LanguageData.FT_Toughness.degreeDatas.1.label: very tough
LanguageData.FT_Toughness.degreeDatas.1.description: If nothing else, NAME can really take a beating!
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.0.label: intimidating
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: NAME has an intimidating personality, this gives HIM an advantage in social interactions.
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.1.label: very intimidating
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.1.descriptio: NAME has a very intimidating personality, this gives HIM a big advantage in social interactions.
LanguageData.FT_Scrapper.degreeDatas.0.label: scrapper
LanguageData.FT_Scrapper.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is good at working with scrap metal. HECAP is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
LanguageData.FT_FortuneFinder.degreeDatas.0.label: fortune finder
LanguageData.FT_FortuneFinder.degreeDatas.0.descripti: NAME seems to discover hidden wealth where ever HE goes.
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.0.label: poor aim
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss HIS target more often in combat.
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.1.label: steady aim
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has great hand-eye coordination and will miss HIS target less often in combat.
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.0.label: agile
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has good reflexes and moves with finesse. HECAP will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.1.label: ninja-like
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. HECAP will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
LanguageData.FT_Stupid.degreeDatas.0.label: stupid
LanguageData.FT_Stupid.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME isn't very smart. HECAP can mess up doing just about anything.
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.0.label: intelligent
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: NAME is smarter than average. HECAP learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around HIM.
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.1.label: very intelligent
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.1.descriptio: NAME is very smart. HECAP learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around HIM.
LanguageData.FT_Oblivious.degreeDatas.0.label: oblivious
LanguageData.FT_Oblivious.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME isn't very aware if HIS surroundings, or anything at all really. HECAP
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.0.label: Perceptive
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a good awareness of HIS surroundings and has a good understanding of how HIS actions affects others.
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.1.label: very perceptive
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME is very aware of HIS surroundings and has a great understanding of how HIS actions affects others.
LanguageData.FT_Scrounger.degreeDatas.0.label: scrounger
LanguageData.FT_Scrounger.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly.
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.0.label: enduring
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has good health and an enduring personality. HECAP is better at handling stressful situations than others.
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.1.label: very enduring
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. HECAP is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
